description: An array of representing all of the double-sided cards in Flesh and Blood.

front_unique_id.description: The Unique ID of the card printing that is the front face of this double-sided card.

back_unique_id.description: The Unique ID of the card printing that is the back face of this double-sided card.

is_DFC.description: A boolean representing whether this double-sided card is a Double Face Card (ex: Invoke Tomeltai / Tomeltai).
